item.title: Roddelen in het dagelijks leven is essentieel voor samenwerking
item.description: Press release about my work on how gossip and reputation in everyday life can promote cooperation published on the website of the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam’.

item.title: Faculty-wide award for best B-thesis in Psychology for Terence das Dores Cruz
item.description: Terence das Dores Cruz has received the annual best bachelor thesis award in psychology for his research.
